channel.title: World record?
channel.description:
RuneScape has entered the record books this week. The game has been recognised as the most popular free MMORPG in the world for the second year in a row, with a certificate awarded by Guinness World Records. That's one record that Usain Bolt didn't manage to get! The presentation took place at the Leipzig Games Convention in Germany, where RuneScape has been showcasing RuneScape HD.
and they call us cheatersss

item.title: World record?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:43, topic:228405"]135 million players my ass…
I saw a update or something like 6 months ago that they just reached a million players. You can’t fucking get 134 million people in six months.[/quote]

135 created accounts, not active. The 1 million players was paying members, and out of those 135 million they said they have about 5-10 million of them active.

Read full topic

item.title: World record?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:34, topic:228405”]I’ve seen 500k people on lately.

And there is different time zones in the world/and parental control (lulz, no there aren’t)

But of course, 140m players is a lie.
140m accounts created, I can belive that.

But 140m accounts active and is being played on at all…
NO WAY[/quote]

500,000 players online? Jagex only have 150-160 worlds, holding 2,000 people at most, so where’d you get that number from?

Read full topic

item.title: World record?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

If you think about it, if each of the 15m currently active players had at least 3 accounts each (which is not including any cheating bots, and is a bit generous), then that is 45m accounts right there. Taking into consideration that on average, each active player probably has around five accounts each, plus taking into consideration cheating bots, 100m accounts is not hard to reach at all. As for 135m, that’s not too far off from 100m.

Read full topic

item.title: World record?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

So much for keeping the 135million accounts created thing on the front page, I suppose?

[quote=“Taharok, post:29, topic:228405”]I hate to reply to such an old topic, but since it is active again, I might as well. I wonder where you got the number 135 million accounts but that seems a bit accurate. According to Wikipedia, RuneScape has about 15 million active free player accounts. If you think about it, with the times of Aryan and other hook bots, some people easily had between 10 and 50 accounts. That really adds up on the million scale. RuneScape also has between 1 and 2 million paid accounts.

World of Warcraft is the most popular paid online game in the world. They have about 10 million active accounts. How can you say RuneScape is not the most popular free game with 15 million accounts?[/quote]

Not sure what amount of time Wiki is calculating that, it was said 5 million active accounts that logged in at least once in the last two weeks.

Read full topic

item.title: World record?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“MybJames, post:30, topic:228405”]Because on WoW you dont need to make 2 accounts if you want 2 characters.

so yeah stfu[/quote]

That doesn’t matter. For WoW, it is $15 per account, thus no one will go and make extra accounts because of that.

The world record standing for RuneScape is in active accounts, not in total accounts, which previously was said to be around 135 million. l2read seriously MybJames.

Read full topic

item.title: World record?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I hate to reply to such an old topic, but since it is active again, I might as well. I wonder where you got the number 135 million accounts but that seems a bit accurate. According to Wikipedia, RuneScape has about 15 million active free player accounts. If you think about it, with the times of Aryan and other hook bots, some people easily had between 10 and 50 accounts. That really adds up on the million scale. RuneScape also has between 1 and 2 million paid accounts.

World of Warcraft is the most popular paid online game in the world. They have about 10 million active accounts. How can you say RuneScape is not the most popular free game with 15 million accounts?

Read full topic
